title: 9G
author: 9G

comments.body: Hello there, I see this is your 2nd thread in the gambling section, other member already suggest you to buy Cooper membership sp your account shall be able to post any image.Its only 0.001 ish BTC, if you dont know where to buy it here is the link https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promoteWill visit your site soon and lets see what is on the table, good luck with the business!

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Lock this thread,  because your platform can't have two active threads as an ANN thread, which is a violation of the forum rules,  I saw your other thread already received a lot of positive comments. So don't jeopardize that with an attempt to create a spam ground here in the gambling sections.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: There was no need to create this thread or do you think this is another form of social media? As a developer and the owner of the casino you have to read instructions before posting anything in the any platform because if someone did this the same thing you are doing in your platform, you will not ba happy about it. And if a gamble is trying to over smart you, you will refer the person to read the terms and conditions of the casino. And here you are violating the forum rules. And it is not that they have not warned you. But you still repeat it again by creating another topic on the same reason.
